com.ibm.iotf.client.api

Class DeviceFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ibm.iotf.client.api.DeviceFactory

  • public class DeviceFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to register, delete and retrieve information about devices
    This class can also be used to retrieve historian information
